section.title: Description
section.p: This section identifies specific household traits of the patient. This section may help identify whether substance abuse is present in the household since it is often a pre-condition to staying sober. Other household traits (e.g. primary source of income) are derived from this assessment section.

stentry.p: This boolean attribute specifies the presence of substance abuse in the household shared by the patient.
This coded attribute specifies the type of income (e.g. supplemental social security insurance, food stamps, employment).
